General.Name: Energisme
General.Description: SA Energisme provides an intelligent platform to help organizations in automating the real-time control of energy performance. The company provides solutions, include energy data processing and smart cities, lighting, metering; performance indicators and multi-fluid data, connected lighting for buildings, measuring temperature and air quality, health monitoring and legionella prevention, and control via smart connectors; energy management system, decarbonization of industry, and data-driven optimization of industrial processes; energy transition and digitalization, and open data and local authorities; and energy and environmental performance. It also serves real estate, retail, manufacturing, facility management, energy suppliers, public sector, and hospitality industries. SA Energisme was founded in 2004 and is based in Paris, France.
General.Address: 88 Avenue du Général Leclerc, Paris, France, 92100
